text: Efrain Alberto Ruales Rios (31 August 1984 - 27 January 2021) was an Ecuadorian actor, television personality, model and musician. ==Biography== He was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. His career started in 2002. He played Benjamin in the black comedy series Solteros sin compromiso and Eduardo in the comedy series ¡Así pasa!. Ruales also presented the variety show En contacto. ==Death== Ruales was shot in the left rib in his car after he leaves the gym in Guayaquil on 27 January 2021. He was pronounced dead at the scene. He was 36 years old.Video muestra el momento en que dispararon a Efraín Ruales ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Modeling (profession) Category:Ecuadorian actors Category:Ecuadorian television personalities Category:Ecuadorian musicians Category:Murders by firearm Category:Entertainers from Guayaquil
title: Efraín Ruales
